CompareFaceLiveness.document: Liveness detection and face comparison passed. Determined to be the same person.
CompareFaceLiveness.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: faceid.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CompareFaceLiveness
<Common request parameters>

{
    "LivenessType": "SILENT",
    "ImageBase64": "iVBORw0KGg...s97n//2Q==",
    "VideoBase64": "AAAAGGZ0eX...AAwAAAAEecg=",
    "ValidateData": ""
}
CompareFaceLiveness.title: Liveness detection and face comparison passed. Determined to be the same person.

CompareFaceLiveness.document: Liveness detection and face comparison failed. Determined not to be the same person.
CompareFaceLiveness.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: faceid.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CompareFaceLiveness
<Common request parameters>

{
    "ImageBase64": "iVBORw0KGg...s97n//2Q==",
    "VideoBase64": "AAAAGGZ0eX...AAwAAAAEecg=",
    "LivenessType": "ACTION",
    "ValidateData": "1"
}
CompareFaceLiveness.title: Liveness detection and face comparison failed. Determined not to be the same person.
